One 2. Two 3. display.name: CPU Busy
display.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together

spec.query: (sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode!="idle"}[$interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[$interval])))) * 100

display.name: Sys Load (5m avg)
display.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (5 min average)

display.name: Sys Load (15m avg)
display.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (15 min average)

display.name: Disk IOps Completed
display.description: The number (after merges) of I/O requests completed per second for the device

display.name: Disk R/W Data
display.description: The number of bytes read from or written to the device per second

display.name: Disk Average Wait Time
display.description: The average time for requests issued to the device to be served. This includes the time spent by the requests in queue and the time spent servicing them.

display.name: Average Queue Size
display.description: The average queue length of the requests that were issued to the device

display.name: Disk R/W Merged
display.description: The number of read and write requests merged per second that were queued to the device

display.name: Time Spent Doing I/Os
display.description: Percentage of elapsed time during which I/O requests were issued to the device (bandwidth utilization for the device). Device saturation occurs when this value is close to 100% for devices serving requests serially.  But for devices  serving requests in parallel, such as RAID arrays and modern SSDs, this number does not reflect their performance limits.

display.name: Instantaneous Queue Size
display.description: The number of outstanding requests at the instant the sample was taken. Incremented as requests are given to appropriate struct request_queue and decremented as they finish.

spec.query: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode="system"}[$interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[$interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode="user"}[$interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[$interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode="iowait"}[$interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[$interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode=~".*irq"}[$interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[$interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode!='idle',mode!='user',mode!='system',mode!='iowait',mode!='irq',mode!='softirq'}[$interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[$interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode="idle"}[$interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[$interval])))

display.name: Disk Space Used Basic
display.description: Disk space used of all filesystems mounted

spec.query: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode="system"}[$interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[$interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode="user"}[$interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[$interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode="nice"}[$interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[$interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode="iowait"}[$interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[$interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode="irq"}[$interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[$interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode="softirq"}[$interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[$interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode="steal"}[$interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[$interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode="idle"}[$interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[$interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_guest_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode="user"}[1m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[1m])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_guest_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode="nice"}[1m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[1m])))
